title: Frontlines.Fuel.of.War.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Frontlines.Fuel.of.War.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:

Year: 2008
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: Kaos Studios / Demiurge Studios
Publisher: THQ
Publication Type: RiP
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: enclosing




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.0 GHz or equivalent AMD
Memory: 512 MB
Video: Nvidia GeForce 6600 or ATI Radeon x800 or higher
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 10 GB

Game information:

Unfolding in the near future, based on the realities of our time,
FFOW tells the story of the next Great World War. While the world's
energy crisis is brewing a new and more and more people become victims
of horrific reality, the group organizes two superpowers military-strategic
alliance, endowed with unprecedented power and military-economic potential.
Join the ranks of the Western Coalition (the United States and the European
Union set up) or the Red Alliance (set up by Russia and China) and smell
the gunpowder in the forefront of the future!

Game Features:

Weapons of the future today! With over 60 types of equipment and weapons
of the future that are based on existing military developments. This
remote-controlled drones, cameras and weapons, and advanced tracking
and targeting Ã¢â€â‚¬ and all of these can directly control the player.
The advanced capabilities of information sharing: Use high-tech system
for collecting and sharing information about the objectives, policies
and threats. Enjoy unparalleled convenience and realistic multiplayer game!
Combining a dynamic FPS and consistent PRG: customization system allows
you to create your own soldiers, changing their uniforms and class.
During the game, the class character will improve, allowing access
to new weapons and abilities.
The new combat system, based on the battle directly to the front line.
This not only creates a unique atmosphere of the fight, but also allows
you to feel what it means to the real victory, while your division
captures a new piece of the front, as a result of receiving additional bonuses.
Choose your way to victory! Use the many tools available to destroy
the enemy and work out your unique strategy for victory.

Repack Features:

Frontlines: Fuel of War
Version of the game - v1.3.0
Do not recoded
Cut multiplayer
